00030 namespace agg
00031 {

00033     //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00034     template<class Transformer = affine_matrix> class gsv_text_outline
00035     {
00036     public:
00037         gsv_text_outline(gsv_text* text, const Transformer* trans) :
00038           m_polyline(text),
00039           m_trans(&m_polyline, trans)
00040         {
00041         }
00042 
00043         void set_thickness(double thickness) 
00044         { 
00045             m_polyline.set_thickness(thickness); 
00046         }
00047 
00048         void set_transformer(const Transformer* trans) 
00049         {
00050             m_trans->set_transformer(trans);
00051         }
00052 
00053         void reset_iterator(unsigned start) 
00054         { 
00055             m_trans.reset_iterator(start); 
00056         }
00057 
00058         pathflag_e next_vertex(double* x, double* y)
00059         {
00060             return m_trans.next_vertex(x, y);
00061         }
00062 
00063     private:
00064         conv_polyline<gsv_text> m_polyline;
00065         conv_transform<conv_polyline<gsv_text>, Transformer> m_trans;
00066     };
